name: Pines Plaza Bowling, Inc., Appellant, v. Rossview, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the able opinion of Judge Loran Lewis, 14 Pa. D. & C. 2d 459.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Aaron Rosemweig, with him Samuel M. Rosemweig, for appellant.

Pines Plaza Bowling, Inc., Appellant, v. Rossview, Inc.
